abilities.name: Dance of Tribute
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, you may draw 3 cards. You can't use more than 1 Dance of Tribute Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Strafe GX
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
